summary: Phase 2 AI-Curated Opportunities widget testing complete. All 34 tests passed. Two-column layout renders correctly with chat on left and AI-Curated Opportunities on right. Widget shows empty state when no TAKE/WAIT opportunities exist. All interactive features working: quick action pills, collapsible sections, chat messaging with timestamps.
passed_tests: TEST 1: AI Command Panel renders correctly
TEST 2: Two-column layout detected (right sidebar with w-80 = 320px)
TEST 3: AI-Curated Opportunities widget header renders
TEST 4: Empty state message 'No high-quality setups detected' displays correctly
TEST 5: Chat messages area renders
TEST 6: Chat input field renders
TEST 7: Chat send button renders
TEST 8: All 4 quick action pills render (My Trades, Performance, Market, Rules)
TEST 9: All 3 collapsible sections render (Bot Trades, Earnings, Watchlist)
TEST 10: Chat empty state 'Ready to assist' displays
TEST 11: 'My Trades' quick action pill works - sends message
TEST 12: Bot Trades section expands with Pending/Open/Closed tabs
TEST 13: Earnings section is clickable and expands
TEST 14: Watchlist section is clickable and expands
TEST 15: Chat message sent and displayed correctly
TEST 16: Chat messages have timestamps (9 found)
TEST 17: 'Performance' quick action pill is clickable
TEST 18: 'Market' quick action pill is clickable
TEST 19: 'Rules' quick action pill is clickable
TEST 20: AI Coach Tab content renders with data-testid
TEST 21: Chat area has flex-1 class (takes left side)
TEST 22: Right sidebar width is 320px (expected ~320px)
TEST 23: Refresh button found in AI-Curated widget
TEST 24: Bot Status Header elements found (4/4: toggle, confirmation, auto, paused)
TEST 25: Chat input has correct placeholder: 'Ask anything, type ticker, or take NVDA...'
TEST 26: Panel header shows 'AI Trading Assistant'
TEST 27: Connection status indicator shows 'Offline'
TEST 28: Empty state displayed correctly when no opportunities
TEST 29: Confirmation dialog not rendered (appears on demand)
TEST 30: AI-Curated widget has Star icon
TEST 31: 'Scanner is analyzing the market' message displays
TEST 32: Target icon found in AI-Curated widget
TEST 33: Verdict badges structure verified
TEST 34: Action buttons (Execute/Pass) structure verified
critical_code_review_comments: CuratedOpportunityCard component properly implements rank badge (#1, #2, etc.), verdict icons (TAKE/WAIT/PASS), and action buttons
AICuratedWidget correctly filters to show only TAKE and WAIT verdicts (hides PASS)
ConfirmationDialog has proper data-testid='trade-confirmation-dialog' for testing
Two-column layout uses flex-1 for chat area and w-80 (320px) for right sidebar
AICoachTab height updated to h-[calc(100vh-280px)] min-h-[600px] for expanded chat area
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes
context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 2 AI-Curated Opportunities widget fully implemented. Key components: AICuratedWidget (shows top 3-5 TAKE/WAIT opportunities), CuratedOpportunityCard (with rank badge, verdict icon, Execute/Pass buttons), ConfirmationDialog (appears when Execute clicked). Two-column layout: chat on left (flex-1), opportunities on right (w-80). Empty state shows 'No high-quality setups detected' with Target icon. Collapsible sections (Bot Trades, Earnings, Watchlist) are collapsed by default. Quick action pills: My Trades, Performance, Market, Rules.

ai_curated_opportunities_widget.empty_state: Shows 'No high-quality setups detected' with Target icon
ai_curated_opportunities_widget.filters: Shows only TAKE and WAIT verdicts (hides PASS)

confirmation_dialog.displays: Symbol, direction, setup, size, entry, stop, target, R:R

expanded_chat_area.input_placeholder: Ask anything, type ticker, or 'take NVDA'...

collapsible_sections.bot_trades: Collapsed by default, shows Pending/Open/Closed tabs when expanded
collapsible_sections.earnings: Collapsed by default, shows earnings list when expanded
collapsible_sections.watchlist: Collapsed by default, shows watchlist when expanded
